segments.text: I'm just watching this kitchen scene unfold, it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely absorbed in drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water pouring out of the sink!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a waterfall right onto the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's already a significant puddle around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so unaware of their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry she's going to slip on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is flowing relentlessly, a continuous stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a mess that will surely cause damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress hem must be getting soaked by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The drain clearly isn't working, or there's no plug in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just baffling to me.
segments.speaker: PAR
